title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Brady's Un-Retirement, Davante Adams Trade with Mike Silver, Nick Wright on Russ Wilson Top 5 Debate, Dave Wannstedt on Trubisky/Steelers
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Brady's Un-Retirement, Davante Adams Trade with Mike Silver, Nick Wright on Russ Wilson Top 5 Debate, Dave Wannstedt on Trubisky/Steelers
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of the Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, Colin's top takes of the week (3:00), including his reaction to the bombshell Tom Brady un-retirement announcement and to the Packers trading All-Pro Davante Adams to the Raiders for picks, and how Aaron Rodgers new deal sealed Adams fate in Green Bay.

First, longtime NFL writer Mike Silver (12:00) on why Aaron Rodgers massive new deal made it impossible to keep Davante Adams in Green Bay, if Rodgers can work with an inexperienced receiving corps, and the ugly public divorce between Baker Mayfield and the Browns.

Then, First Things First co-host - and host of the What's Wright? podcast - Nick Wright (33:00) discusses what's behind LeBron's scoring binge if Russell Wilson is still a Top 5 NFL QB and if Lamar Jackson needs an agent to get his extension done.

Finally, former Bears & Dolphins HC and Cowboys DC Dave Wannstedt (46:00) explains why he's more bullish on Mitch Trubisky to the Steelers than most, if Bill Belichick deserves the benefit of the doubt for some heavily criticized personnel moves with JC Jackson and Shaq Mason, and if the Bears have reason for optimism with a new coach and GM regime.

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
